text: The Cârcinov is a left tributary of the river Argeș in Romania. It discharges into the Argeș near Topoloveni. It flows through the towns and villages Boțești, Dobrești, Beleți, Albotele, Priboieni, Gorănești, Crintești, Boțârcani, Țigănești and Topoloveni. Its length is and its basin size is . ==References== * Trasee turistice – județul Argeș Category:Rivers of Romania Category:Rivers of Argeș County
title: Cârcinov
